languages.text: {n}Абеляр кривится, как от зубной боли, даже не пытаясь скрыть чувств.{/n} "Знаете, Лорд-капитан, я не поклонник изящных искусств, но когда найдется время и мы будем в каком-нибудь цивилизованном порту — непременно найду живописца и закажу ему портрет указанной вами персоны с дырой меж глаз. Кунрад Войгтвир! То, что он ушел живым после предательства, — огромное, огромное упущение".

traits.locale_text: {n}Абеляр кривится, как от зубной боли, даже не пытаясь скрыть чувств.{/n} "Знаете, Лорд-капитан, я не поклонник изящных искусств, но когда найдется время и мы будем в каком-нибудь цивилизованном порту — непременно найду живописца и закажу ему портрет указанной вами персоны с дырой меж глаз. Кунрад Войгтвир! То, что он ушел живым после предательства — огромное, огромное упущение".
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abelard winces as though from toothache and he makes no attempt to hide his feelings.{/n} "You know, Lord Captain, I am no admirer of fine art, but when we next find ourselves in a civilised port with time to spare, I will promptly find an artist and commission a portrait of the individual to whom you refer — with a hole between the eyes. Kunrad Voigtvir! That he committed his treachery and escaped with his life was an unforgivable oversight."
languages.original_text: {n}Абеляр кривится, как от зубной боли, даже не пытаясь скрыть чувств.{/n} "Знаете, Лорд-капитан, я не поклонник изящных искусств, но когда найдется время и мы будем в каком-нибудь цивилизованном порту — непременно найду живописца и закажу ему портрет указанной вами персоны с дырой меж глаз. Кунрад Войгтвир! То, что он ушел живым после предательства, — огромное, огромное упущение".

Kunrad Voigtvir! That he committed his treachery and escaped with his life was an unforgivable oversight."

languages.text: {n}阿贝拉德的脸颊抽搐着，仿佛牙疼一样。他并没有试图掩饰自己的情绪。{/n}“如您所知，舰长大人，我对艺术并没有太多兴趣。但如果下次我们停靠在文明的港口，有足够的时间的话，我打算委托当地的艺术家，为昆拉德·维特威尔画幅肖像画，在他的双眼之间开个大洞！他犯下了背叛的大罪，还逃过了一劫，这是不可原谅的疏漏。”
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard winces as though from toothache and he makes no attempt to hide his feelings.{/n} "You know, Lord Captain, I am no admirer of fine art, but when we next find ourselves in a civilised port with time to spare, I will promptly find an artist and commission a portrait of the individual to whom you refer — with a hole between the eyes. Kunrad Voigtvir! That he committed his treachery and escaped with his life was an unforgivable oversight."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿贝拉德的脸颊抽搐着，仿佛牙疼一样。他并没有试图掩饰自己的情绪。{/n}“如您所知，舰长大人，我对艺术并没有太多兴趣。但如果下次我们停靠在文明的港口，有足够的时间的话，我打算委托当地的艺术家，为昆拉德·维特威尔画幅肖像画，在他的双眼之间开个大洞！他犯下了背叛的大罪，还逃过了一劫，这是不可原谅的疏漏。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Abelard winces as though from toothache and he makes no attempt to hide his feelings.{/n} "You know, Lord Captain, I am no admirer of fine art, but when we next find ourselves in a civilised port with time to spare, I will promptly find an artist and commission a portrait of the individual to whom you refer — with a hole between the eyes. Kunrad Voigtvir! That he committed his treachery and escaped with his life was an unforgivable oversight."

languages.text: {n}Abelard se estremece como si tuviera dolor de muelas y no se molesta en ocultar sus sentimientos.{/n} «¿Sabe, Lord Capitán? No soy precisamente un admirador de las bellas artes, pero la próxima vez que estemos en un puerto civilizado con algo de tiempo de sobra, tengo intención de encontrar a un artista y encargarle un retrato del individuo al que se refiere... con un agujero entre ceja y ceja. ¡Kunrad Voigtvir! El hecho de que siga vivo después de su traición es fruto de un descuido imperdonable».
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard winces as though from toothache and he makes no attempt to hide his feelings.{/n} "You know, Lord Captain, I am no admirer of fine art, but when we next find ourselves in a civilised port with time to spare, I will promptly find an artist and commission a portrait of the individual to whom you refer — with a hole between the eyes. Kunrad Voigtvir! That he committed his treachery and escaped with his life was an unforgivable oversight."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard se estremece como si tuviera dolor de muelas y no se molesta en ocultar sus sentimientos.{/n} «¿Sabe, Lord Capitán? No soy precisamente un admirador de las bellas artes, pero la próxima vez que estemos en un puerto civilizado con algo de tiempo de sobra, tengo intención de encontrar a un artista y encargarle un retrato del individuo al que se refiere... con un agujero entre ceja y ceja. ¡Kunrad Voigtvir! El hecho de que siga vivo después de su traición es fruto de un descuido imperdonable».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}アベラルドは歯を痛めたかのように顔をしかめ、その感情を隠そうともしなかった。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン、私は美術品の愛好家ではありませんが、今度時間的に余裕雨のある余裕のある宇宙港に着いたら、すぐに画家を見つけて、あなたのおっしゃる人物の肖像画を依頼しますよ…眉間に穴の空いた姿をね！クンラッド・ボイトヴィル！ヤツが裏切りを犯しながらも、逃げ延びたことは、許しがたい過失です」
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard winces as though from toothache and he makes no attempt to hide his feelings.{/n} "You know, Lord Captain, I am no admirer of fine art, but when we next find ourselves in a civilised port with time to spare, I will promptly find an artist and commission a portrait of the individual to whom you refer — with a hole between the eyes. Kunrad Voigtvir! That he committed his treachery and escaped with his life was an unforgivable oversight."

traits.locale_text: {n}アベラルドは歯を痛めたかのように顔をしかめ、その感情を隠そうともしなかった。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン、私は美術品の愛好家ではありませんが、今度時間的に余裕雨のある余裕のある宇宙港に着いたら、すぐに画家を見つけて、あなたのおっしゃる人物の肖像画を依頼しますよ…眉間に穴の空いた姿をね！クンラッド・ボイトヴィル！ヤツが裏切りを犯しながらも、逃げ延びたことは、許しがたい過失です」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abelard verzieht das Gesicht, als hätte er Zahnschmerzen, und unternimmt keinen Versuch, seine Gefühle zu verbergen.{/n} "Wisst Ihr, Lord Captain, ich verstehe nicht viel von Kunst, doch wenn wir uns das nächste Mal mit etwas Freizeit in einem zivilisierten Hafen befinden, werde ich unverzüglich einen Künstler finden und ein Porträt der Person in Auftrag geben, von der Ihr sprecht — mit einem Loch zwischen den Augen. Kunrad Voigtvir! Dass er seinen Verrat begangen und mit dem Leben entkommen ist, war ein unverzeihliches Versäumnis."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard winces as though from toothache and he makes no attempt to hide his feelings.{/n} "You know, Lord Captain, I am no admirer of fine art, but when we next find ourselves in a civilised port with time to spare, I will promptly find an artist and commission a portrait of the individual to whom you refer — with a hole between the eyes. Kunrad Voigtvir! That he committed his treachery and escaped with his life was an unforgivable oversight."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard verzieht das Gesicht, als hätte er Zahnschmerzen, und unternimmt keinen Versuch, seine Gefühle zu verbergen.{/n} "Wisst Ihr, Lord Captain, ich verstehe nicht viel von Kunst, doch wenn wir uns das nächste Mal mit etwas Freizeit in einem zivilisierten Hafen befinden, werde ich unverzüglich einen Künstler finden und ein Porträt der Person in Auftrag geben, von der Ihr sprecht — mit einem Loch zwischen den Augen. Kunrad Voigtvir! Dass er seinen Verrat begangen und mit dem Leben entkommen ist, war ein unverzeihliches Versäumnis."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abélard fait une grimace comme s'il avait mal aux dents, sans essayer de dissimuler ce qu'il ressent.{/n} « Vous savez, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, je ne suis pas féru des beaux-arts, mais si nous avons le temps, je profiterai de notre prochaine escale dans un port civilisé pour trouver un artiste et lui commander un portrait de l'individu dont vous parlez... avec un trou entre les yeux. Kunrad Voigtvir ! Nous avons commis une erreur impardonnable en le laissant commettre cette trahison et prendre la fuite. »
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard winces as though from toothache and he makes no attempt to hide his feelings.{/n} "You know, Lord Captain, I am no admirer of fine art, but when we next find ourselves in a civilised port with time to spare, I will promptly find an artist and commission a portrait of the individual to whom you refer — with a hole between the eyes. Kunrad Voigtvir! That he committed his treachery and escaped with his life was an unforgivable oversight."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abélard fait une grimace comme s'il avait mal aux dents, sans essayer de dissimuler ce qu'il ressent.{/n} « Vous savez, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, je ne suis pas féru des beaux-arts, mais si nous avons le temps, je profiterai de notre prochaine escale dans un port civilisé pour trouver un artiste et lui commander un portrait de l'individu dont vous parlez... avec un trou entre les yeux. Kunrad Voigtvir ! Nous avons commis une erreur impardonnable en le laissant commettre cette trahison et prendre la fuite. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abelard, diş ağrısından muzdaripçesine yüz ekşitiyor. Hislerini gizlemek için hiç çaba göstermiyor.{/n} "Biliyor musunuz Lord Kaptan, ben sanattan hiç anlamam. Fakat medeni bir limana yanaşıp boş vakit bulduğumuzda derhâl bir ressam tutup bahsettiğiniz şahsın alnının çatından vurulmuş bir resmini çizdireceğim. Kunrad Voigtvir! Yaptığı hainlik yanına kâr kalmamalıydı."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard winces as though from toothache and he makes no attempt to hide his feelings.{/n} "You know, Lord Captain, I am no admirer of fine art, but when we next find ourselves in a civilised port with time to spare, I will promptly find an artist and commission a portrait of the individual to whom you refer — with a hole between the eyes. Kunrad Voigtvir! That he committed his treachery and escaped with his life was an unforgivable oversight."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard, diş ağrısından muzdaripçesine yüz ekşitiyor. Hislerini gizlemek için hiç çaba göstermiyor.{/n} "Biliyor musunuz Lord Kaptan, ben sanattan hiç anlamam. Fakat medeni bir limana yanaşıp boş vakit bulduğumuzda derhâl bir ressam tutup bahsettiğiniz şahsın alnının çatından vurulmuş hâlde bir resmini çizdireceğim. Kunrad Voigtvir! Yaptığı hainlik yanına kâr kalmamalıydı."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
